ground_truth.thought: 我想要了解网红经济中的品牌合作模式。首先，在品牌数据库获取网红与品牌合作的成功案例。然后，查询品牌合作的效果评估数据。接着，获取品牌合作的流程和注意事项。最后，通过品牌研究报告获取未来网红与品牌合作的趋势，并获取相关的法律风险防范措施。
ground_truth.name: BrandInsight.get_brand_collaboration_details

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'BrandInsight.get_brand_collaboration_details', 'description': 'Get details of brand collaborations including successful cases, effect evaluation, process, and legal risk prevention measures.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of a brand collaboration'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'case_study', 'description': 'A successful case of brand collaboration.'}, {'name': 'effect_evaluation', 'description': 'Data on the effectiveness of brand collaboration.'}, {'name': 'process', 'description': 'The process of brand collaboration.'}, {'name': 'legal_risks', 'description': 'Legal risk prevention measures for brand collaboration.'}, {'name': 'future_trends', 'description': 'Future trends in brand collaboration.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名市场分析师，正在研究网红经济中的品牌合作模式。我需要获取网红与品牌合作的成功案例，查询品牌合作的效果评估数据，了解品牌合作的流程和注意事项，以及获取未来网红与品牌合作的趋势和相关的法律风险防范措施。当前这一步的目标是什么?
我想要了解网红经济中的品牌合作模式。首先，在品牌数据库获取网红与品牌合作的成功案例。然后，查询品牌合作的效果评估数据。接着，获取品牌合作的流程和注意事项。最后，通过品牌研究报告获取未来网红与品牌合作的趋势，并获取相关的法律风险防范措施。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?

{'case_study': 'Influencer X collaborated with Brand Y, resulting in a 30% increase in sales.', 'effect_evaluation': 'The collaboration led to a significant increase in brand awareness and customer engagement.', 'process': 'The collaboration process includes initial contact, negotiation, agreement, execution, and post-collaboration analysis.', 'legal_risks': 'Ensure compliance with advertising standards and disclosure requirements.', 'future_trends': 'Brands are increasingly looking to collaborate with micro-influencers for more targeted marketing.'}

请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
